text: Faddoul is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Charla Baklayan Faddoul (born 1976), American reality television personality *Ghassan Faddoul (born 1955), Lebanese long jumper and javelin thrower *Simon Faddoul (born 1958), Apostolic Exarch of the Maronite Catholic Apostolic Exarchate of Western and Central Africa
title: Faddoul
